categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars drafts

nodes.text: The Del Andue were a strange-looking sentient species. In 3 ABY, the Jedi Luke Skywalker spent some time living in a hovel on the planet Tatooine with two Del Andues while he made preparations to rescue his friend Han Solo from the clutches of the crime lord Jabba the Hutt.

The Del Andues featured in rough draft of the script of the film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, the final installment of the Original trilogy, and were set to appear in the opening scenes of the film. In the revised rough draft version of the script, the Del Andues were replaced by the Jawas Tweetu and Atetu.
